output.sentences: It was Bill's birthday and we all went out to celebrate by eating cake.
We went to a restaurant Bill and John had a hamburger competition.
We met this girl who was fun and had a nice smile.
Bill and his girlfriend were having fun and drinking.
Before it was time to go John and that girl became girlfriend and boyfriend.
